data.name: RPG Sounds - Townsfolk - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Townsfolk is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • The Jester's Waltz
  • The Quest
  • Triumph Dance

Ambience
  • Church Interior
  • Town Big Market
  • Busy Construction
  • Fountain Close
  • Horse Movement
  • Main Plaza

SFX
  • City Guard March By (4)
  • Cathedral Bell (3)
  • Port Bell (4)

data.short_description: Townsfolk is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
